fields.name: ContainerRunOptions
fields.description: These additional options are supplied as arguments to the "docker create" command, in addition to those controlled by the Batch Service.

fields.name: ImageName
fields.description: This is the full image reference, as would be specified to "docker pull". If no tag is provided as part of the image name, the tag ":latest" is used as a default.

fields.name: Registry
fields.description: This setting can be omitted if was already provided at pool creation.
